entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Miscellaneous.CopyCtor.ValidateCopyConstructorAndDestructorCalled failing with "Values Differ" #106428
  • Possible tiered compilation issue in preview.7 #106427
  • LdapConnection Modify Request Under Linux/AOT Fails with Encoding Error #106412
  • WASM build failed to download geckodriver due to network blip #106407
  • [Android] App crashing with condition `xref_count == xref_index' not met #106410
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!fgRngChkThrowAdded' during 'Calculate stack level slots' #106401
    10.0.0
  • Reduce number of exceptions in HttpClientFactory #106399
    Future
  • Replacement for mono-symbolicate #106395
    10.0.0
  • OpenSslCachedSystemStoreProvider refreshes certificates hard coded every 5 minutes which delays TLS connection handshake #106394
  • JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_101046 fails on mono osx-x64 #106393
  • [STJ] Disallow property names that conflict with metadata property names #106390
    10.0.0
  • [Analyzer proposal]: Replace literal enum member ToString with nameof #106381
    Future
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'endOffset > startOffset' during 'Emit GC+EH tables' #106379
    9.0.0
  • Guid.CreateVersion7() could be faster #106377
  • 'chrome-DebuggerTests.ExceptionTests' timing out #106376
    10.0.0

Closed

  • JIT: Small primitives on arm32/apple arm64 ABI need explicit normalization to 32 bits #101046
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Implement drawing API #106373
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 2 Regressions on 3/7/2024 9:14:14 PM #99616
    10.0.0
  • [mono][perf] WASM disk size regression on 04 Jan 2023 #80737
    9.0.0
  • C++/CLI x86 marshalling misses copy ctor/dtor calls resulting in C++ STL iterator debugging breaking #100033
  • Test failure: Interop/IJW/CopyConstructorMarshaler/CopyConstructorMarshaler/CopyConstructorMarshaler.cmd #100751
    9.0.0
  • Enum decorated with [JsonStringEnumMemberName] fails to deserialize #106406
  • System.Threading.ThreadPools.Tests.ThreadPoolTests.IOCompletionPortCountConfigVarTest failure - time out, unexpected exit code #106206
  • Min 0 Budget changes between 2.2 -> 3.x+ leads to P99 regressions #52623
    Future
  • Native SGen crash after updating from 8004 to 8053 #101905
  • using dotnet6.0 on win7 crash #104967
  • fx_ver::parse SIGABRTs on Mac with new toolset update #68927
    9.0.0
  • Arm64/Sve: Validation for movprfx in emitter #105514
    9.0.0
  • RespectNullableAnnotations option should disallow setting non-nullable record parameter to null #106392
    9.0.0
  • Unix Console SetWindowSize implementation #96208
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Bad codegen with `Avx512F.VL.RotateLeftVariable` and `Avx512F.VL.RotateRightVariable` on win-x86 #106142
    9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Enable `ConditionalSelect_FalseOp` scenario in first-faulting test templates #106279
    9.0.0
  • [Apple] Microsoft-Diagnostics-DiagnosticSource EventSource not terminated properly #104881
    9.0.0
  • JIT: SVE Assertion failed 'targetReg != embMaskOp2Reg' during 'Generate code' #105474
    9.0.0
  • Arm64: Add SVE/SVE2 support in .NET 9 #93095
    9.0.0
  • [ARM64] Post-indexed addressing mode does not work on spans #106365
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'type != TYP_VOID' during 'Optimize Valnum CSEs' #106380
    9.0.0
  • WebClient() Removal Timeline #106325
  • [mono] LLVM 19 build failures #105319
    9.0.0
  • The HttpListener in Linux runtime always throws a "Cannot assign requested address" exception when calling the Start method for regular URLs #106385
    Future
  • Convert.FromBase64(string s) not able to convert valid string #106386
    Future
  • [browser][AOT] some assignments are not properly rooted #106200
    9.0.0
  • Mono Runtime crash when debug evaluating/inspecting/monitor member #106311
    9.0.0
  • Arm64/Sve: Ld/St info should be added for SVE instructions #105512
    9.0.0
  • SslStream.HashAlgorithm does not seems to work with Tls12 and above #37578
    10.0.0
  • ExchangeAlgorithmType enum is missing 44550 #55570
    10.0.0
  • Port System.Numerics documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88570
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: TypeName.MakeSimpleTypeName(AssemblyNameInfo) to avoid type name reparsing #106022
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Directed/tailcall/more_tailcalls/more_tailcalls.cmd #99410
    9.0.0
  • [MonoAOT] [x64] Return non-void in Function of void return type #106259
  • [ios-8.0/9.0] Cannot compile project with AOT enabled (Assertion at mini-llvm.c, condition `cinfo->ret.nslots == 1' not met) #103628
    9.0.0
  • System.Formats.Nrbf lacks a package readme #103481
    9.0.0
  • Arm64: Implement SVE APIs #99957
    9.0.0
  • Test `System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.ReflectionOnly.Tests` stack overflowing in Windows x64 release for `libraries-pgo` pipeline #100246
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Bad codegen with `Avx512F.Min` #105966
    9.0.0
  • SmtpClient SendAsync Fails to send emails even thought it doesn't error #99276
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "[browser] Remove check for user agent when attaching debugger" #106426
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Add inter branch merge flow config for 9.0 RC branches #106425
    area-Infrastructure
  • Inject IJW Copy Constructor calls in the JIT instead of in the IL stubs #106424
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Add overload to the AddHostedService #106423
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Port of dependency name update: https://github.com/dotnet/performance/pull/4396 #106422
    area-Infrastructure
  • Bump versioning to .NET 10 #106421
    area-Infrastructure, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Cast UInt64 to Single directly on ARM64 during const folding #106419
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Switch to the MacOS arm64 pool for official builds #106416
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [GC} Allow distribute_free_regions to decommit and redistribute #106414
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [cdac] Basic ISOSDacInterface::GetMethodDescData #106413
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [Tar] Fill in the file size even if the file is empty. #106409
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Revert "Disable QUIC&HTTP/3 parallelization on tests (#104948)" #106404
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http
  • [wasm] Clean emsdk setup #106403
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Reduce committed bytes if mark array commit fails #106400
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Make SafeEvpPKeyHandle.OpenKeyFromProvider throw PNSE on OSSL less than 3.0 #106397
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Expose QUIC TLS details on QuicConnection. #106391
    NO-MERGE, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Allow to build browser in library mode #106388
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Disabled stackoverflow tests with largeframe for RISCV64 #106383
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fallback to treating as object if not collection #106378
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Fix Enum field type bug found when underlying type is set from assembly loaded with MLC #106375
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, 9.0.0
  • add support for parallel Connect #106374
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0

Merged

  • JIT: Sign/zero-extend small primitive arguments for pinvokes on arm32 and Apple arm64 #106314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Provide System.Reflection.Context package readme #106398
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Reorder asserts in `TypeBuilderState` #106418
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix metrics size regression #106415
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Disable stackoverflowtester test for osx-x64 #106411
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix the IOCP count config var test #106408
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Revert "Inject IJW Copy Constructor calls in the JIT instead of in the IL stubs" #106420
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Provide Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.Specification.Tests package readme #106317
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Bring back assert in fx_ver_t::parse #106050
    area-Host
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: add test coverage for *Faulting* cases to make sure inactive lanes are zeroed out (#105580) #106139
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve, 9.0.0
  • Inject IJW Copy Constructor calls in the JIT instead of in the IL stubs #106000
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add more images to table #106336
    needs-area-label
  • ARM64-SVE: Add checks for MOVPRFX sequencing (#105514) #106184
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve, 9.0.0
  • Fixes #106142. #106369
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Console.Unix: revert SetWindowSize implementation. #100272
    area-System.Console, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Enable `ConditionalSelect_FalseOp` scenario for first-faulting tests #106349
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, Priority:2, arm-sve, 9.0.0
  • Add DiagnosticSource to CheckNonEventSourcesRunning #106337
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Creating new TypeName without reparsing + usage in NRBF #103713
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, binaryformatter-migration
  • [mono] Remove unused CompareExchange icall #106396
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Arm64/Sve: Fix overzealous assert for embedded mask intrinsics with RMW semantics #105541
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Disallow separate CSE candidates for struct `GT_COMMA`s #106387
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Modify dwarfReg in jit/unwindloongarch64.cpp to be consistent with the latest la-abi. #106382
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [mono][debugger] Fix evaluate method in a struct that doesn't need extra_space #106351
    area-Debugger-mono
  • wasm-mt: Fix Environment.ProcessorCount ILLink substitution to 1 #106384
    area-Build-mono
  • ARM-SVE: Add LD/ST info to SVE instructions #105512 #106328
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve, 9.0.0
  • Add missing xml docs for System.Numerics #106290
    area-System.Numerics
  • Fix a couple commutative flags to be correct #106332
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for Add Sve.GatherVectorUInt*ZeroExtendFirstFaulting() #105030
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve, 9.0.0
  • Reenable more_tailcalls under GCStress #106287
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [Mono AOT] Fix error when returning zero sized struct #106013
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • add PACKAGE.md for System.Formats.Nrbf #106344
    documentation, binaryformatter-migration, area-System.Formats.Nrbf, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] Synthesize a valid ECMA-335 image for read/write metadata instead of providing a separate metadata reader #106164
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure we consistently broadcast the result of simd dot product #106031
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.9
  • Skip deeply-recursive test in `System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.ReflectionOnly.Tests` if doing random OSR #106335
    needs-area-label
  • [cdac] Implement ISOSDacInterface::GetPEFileName in cDAC #106358
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Update to Preview7 SDK #106333
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix issue 105966. #106364
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add missing delegating/override method in TlsStream #106362
    area-System.Net
  • Bump Windows MsQuic version to 2.4.3 #106363
    area-System.Net.Quic

Updated

  • fix #105969 #106218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Fix EventListenerThreadPool test #105895
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Remove managed interfaces impls defined in CoreCLR #105965
    area-Interop-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Add Azure 3.0 helix test #106330
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • GC cleanup #105517
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Enhance the bound generator concept to remove duplicate parameters and make it more pervasive throughout the system #105597
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 10.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2515782 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Instrumentation #100294
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Update RedHat 7 -> 8 -- release/6.0-staging #105063
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Check HFA alignment for valuetype fields #106099
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Small tuning for write-barrier on arm64 #106191
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Add Ubuntu 24.04 Helix Images to pipeline #106048
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use .alt_entry/.private_extern on Apple platforms #106224
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Track generic instantiations in ILLink #106370
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add DI specification test for ensuring externally provided instance services are not disposed on provider disposal. #104853
    NO-MERGE, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Fix: SafeBerHandle and HGlobalMemHandle leaks in BerConverter #106316
    NO-MERGE, area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [NRBF] Don't use Unsafe.As when decoding DateTime(s) #105749
    area-System.Formats.Nrbf, 9.0.0
  • Switch DirectoryControl to use AsnWriter, AsnDecoder #101512
    NO-MERGE, area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [TypeName] Nested types should respect MaxNode count #106334
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, 9.0.0
  • Implement BinaryReader.ReadExactly #106238
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Make all of the trimmer aware of recursive interfaces #103317
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • Run native aot runtime tests on cet compatible machines #105288
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm] Integrate naot-llvm into workload manifest #101801
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [RISC-V] Disable robust mutexes in PAL on Qemu #106123
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser][MT][hybridglobalization] Run `HybridGlobalization` threading tests #102595
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • [NativeAOT] Fix stack trace iteration over exceptions #105877
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] Fix `HybridGlobalization`, SoftHyphen is not ignored when it should be #105946
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Implement IEnumerator<T> on ref struct enumerators #106309
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [NRBF] Reject orphaned records and invalid references #103632
    binaryformatter-migration, area-System.Formats.Nrbf, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Bundle assets inside of wasm file #103160
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Bump to updated llvm 19 #105427
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Flight new nuget code in a new SDK #106348
    needs-area-label

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-14
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] support `System.Net.Http.HttpClient` on WASIp2 #2614
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • Integrate TypeSpec into TypeDecls and ABI parsing. #2650
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] add support for building WASI and browser debug & release on Linux #2605
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.JavaScript.SDK fails to generate package.g.props and then to do npm run build #42741
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.4xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #42733
  • [8.0.400] MSBuild Crash when publishing containers #42731
  • Razer escape @@ results in build error since SDK 8.0.400 #42730
  • after updating to sdk 9.0.100-preview.7.24407.12 build fails with "MSB3030: Could not copy the file...apphost.exe" #42722
  • Dotnet publish container regression in 8.0.400 #42719
  • Add option to `dotnet format` to format a single file provided on stdin #42713

Closed

  • Take the .NET CLI Survey to help shape the future of .NET Tooling #42024

PullRequests

Created

  • Update the loc build to target 9.0.1xx #42746
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implicit version update to the live version for RC1 #42745
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • RC2 Branding #42744
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Alpha Branding #42743
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove internet sources from auditSources section #42740
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #42739
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #42738
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #42737
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #42736
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #42735
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change kind #42718
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • Remove 8.0.4xx from build table as it enters servicing phase #42716
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • ResolvePackageReferences: PackageDependenciesDesignTime inherits transitive package DiagnosticLevel #42546
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #42698
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.3xx #42700
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Add CompilerVisibleProperty needed for analyzer in Windows SDK projection #42655
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Add CompilerVisibleProperty needed for analyzer in Windows SDK projection #42656
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Add CompilerVisibleProperty needed for analyzer in Windows SDK projection #42664
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [release/8.0.3xx] Add CompilerVisibleProperty needed for analyzer in Windows SDK projection #42665
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [release/8.0.4xx] Add CompilerVisibleProperty needed for analyzer in Windows SDK projection #42666
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #42694
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix --no-build option bug #42729
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #42693
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #42715
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support globbing filter for dotnet test #42670
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #42703
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Enable CI builds for the public RC2 branch #42747
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Extend `dotnet run` to invoke a run-command-producing Target #42240
  • Maybe permit users to find latest set versions #42652
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.4xx #42701
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • .NET Source-Build 9.0.100-preview.7.24407.1 August 2024 Updates #42699
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Try out new NuGet dependency resolver #42682
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-14

Issues

Created

  • `field` keyword nullability #8360

PullRequests

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Bad performance in CSharpRemoveUnnecessaryImportsDiagnosticAnalyzer with System.Text.Json source generator #74761
  • IDE0130 warning "Namespace 'Foo.Bar' does not match folder structure, expected 'Foo_xyz_wpftmp.Bar'" when EnforceCodeStyleInBuild is enabled #74758
  • Add `IMethodSymbol Deconstruct` to `IDeconstructionAssignmentOperation` #74757
  • Go To Definition stops working #74756

Closed

  • IDE0100 triggers on `boolVariable is false` or `boolVariable is true` #74755
  • Collection expressions use `AddRange` instead of manual `foreach` in presence of a struct enumerator #74615
    Backlog
  • Building twice in VS is broken. #74314
  • Generator vs xaml generated files (the "*.g.i.cs") #74685
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35213.67 #74754

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove net35 reference assemblies #74763
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Do not run 'remove unnecessary imports' on generated code #74762
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • 17.10: Cherry-pick fix for scenario where lightbulbs weren't being displayed #74760
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Remove nonexistent folders from the solution explorer #74759
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Use manual `foreach` instead of `AddRange` method for certain collection expression spreads #74630
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Cleanup LSP error reporting #74530
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unnecessary CODE_STYLE workarounds #74697
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add support in DevKit for source link go to definition #74626
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Refactor semantic snippets #74712
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Use existing property to access services #74749
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Disable build on test refresh #74751
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Reduce allocations from newline information allocated by ChangedText.GetLinesCore #74728
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add option for LSP based auto-insert #74485
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Report field diagnostic as warning, only report when ambiguous, and only with preview language version #74729
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Expose document symbols to Razor cohosting #74730
    VSCode
  • Use single argument overload for `[start..]` of `string` or `(ReadOnly)Span` #74643
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Make semantic APIs return more consistent results for `new T()` expressions #74675
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix nested nullability of collection expressions #74490
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Rename Tools/Options inline hint settings #71855
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Add file watchers for analyzer references #74745
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix leading comments not being preserved on variable case #74278
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Update LSP Protocol Types #73911
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Question] Is there a way to properly emulate InvalidModelStateResponseFactory in minimal apis? #57337
  • Perf regression: endpoint #57335
  • Perf improvement: mvc #57334
  • Server URLs in OpenAPI document are incorrect when application used with .NET Aspire #57332
  • Issue adding static server-side rendering (SSR) pages to a globally interactive Blazor Web App #57329
  • Use case support for Blazor Web App in Interactive Auto mode #57327
  • Unexpected Syntax Error in blazor.web.js on iOS Versions Below 17 in .NET 9 Preview 7 #57326
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #57325

Closed

  • .NET Core 8+ Api failing intermittently (w/ Swagger) #53028
  • OpenAPI operations include parameters disallowed by OpenAPI 3.0 specification #57305
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Exception from dotnet build for project using JsonPolymorphic with TypeDiscriminatorPropertyName #56575
  • New Descripton Parameter for Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ProducesResponseTypeAttribute Class #17608
    Backlog
  • SDK 8.0.101 - Endpoint Filters and Output Caching - endpoint filters do not run prior to the cache hit #53460
  • Perf improvement: mvc #57270
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #57321

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider making BlazorWebView Android 'fire and forget' disposal on by default #24250

  • System.IO.FileNotFoundException: '' on App Startup #24240
  • [iOS] Lifecycle for push notifications needs to be conditionally implemented #24237
    9.0-rc1
  • [NET9] iOS Run Templates on NET9 are failing #24236
    Backlog
  • Add a CanSwipe property to SwipeView #24235
  • Problem initializing WindowsForms.BlazorWebView -- The path is empty. (Parameter 'relativeTo') #24234
  • [Android, 9.0 Preview 7] Blue notification / action bar started to appear on all modal pages #24232
    9.0-rc1
  • RefreshView IsEnabled not working (iOS/Android) #24228

Closed

  • Blazor + Web App template produces version mismatch warning #23946
  • [.NET MAUI 9.0 Preview 7] Blue Notification / action bar started to appear on all modal pages #24239

    .NET 8 SR9
  • Title not updated after OnAppearing for TabbedPage in NavigationPage #22899

  • [Windows] [.NET 9.0 Preview 5] App icon in the taskbar is pixelated #23212
    Backlog
  • Pre-filled Entry ignores TextColor on iOS #20196
  • [Android] Dynamically loading an assembly results in BadImageFormatException #24221

Merged

  • [Testing] Added specific actions by platform #21330
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing

    area-single-project, community ✨

    area-infrastructure

Updated

    area-controls-hybridwebview

  • [Mac Catalyst] Set window dimensions #24001

  • Fix SafeArea adjustments #23729

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inline property accessors to avoid lambdas with closures in the compiled model #34442
    Backlog
  • By default, don't use the backing field for non-virtual auto-props #34441
    Backlog
  • Generate less code in the compiled model #34440
    Backlog
  • New migration lock mechanism happens outside of transaction #34439
    9.0.0
  • Unexpected query results with UseRelationalNulls and Sum() #34436
    Backlog
  • Add JSON type tests to CSharpMigrationsGeneratorTest and CompiledModelSqlServerTest #34435
  • Change GetJsonPropertyName to not get the value from the principal #34434
    9.0.0
  • Test the native JSON type where the principal is mapped to a view. #34433
  • Cleanup JsonElementTypeMapping #34432
    Backlog
  • The message "An exception occurred while iterating over the results of a query for context type 'X'." can not be caught #34430

Closed

  • Compiled model performance trends #33483
    9.0.0
  • OwnedNavigationBuilder.HasIndex lacks overload with name argument #33739
    9.0.0
  • Add IConventionEntityTypeBuilder API for UseSqlReturningClause #33287
    9.0.0
  • PendingModelChangesWarning when creating new database using .NET 9 rc.1 nightly build #34431
  • Implement support for the new SQL Server native JSON type #32150
    9.0.0
  • Json: add ability to specify type of the json column #28452
    9.0.0
  • NativeAOT work for 9.0 #29754
    9.0.0
  • EF Core database provider for Azure Cosmos DB, work done in 9.0 #33033
    9.0.0
  • Cosmos: Translate subquery in filter condition #17957
    9.0.0
  • Cosmos: Support queries into primitive collections #25765
    9.0.0
  • 9.0 API Reviews #33220
    9.0.0
  • dotnet -ef on MacOS intelx64 throws error #34202
  • Execution strategy for migration #17578
    9.0.0
  • Remove Migrate lock timeout #34196
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0-rc1] Fix OptimisticConcurrencyCosmosTest #34443
    tell-mode
  • Update branding to 10.0.0-alpha1 #34438
  • Cosmos: strip implicit casts to allow vector search over arrays #34437

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #34425
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #34426
  • Add missing Model Builder API #34427
  • Don't generate code for precached values in the compiled model by default #34412
  • Experimental support for the Azure SQL JSON type #34401
  • remove SqlServerQueryTranslationPostprocessorFactory _typeMappingSource #34429
  • Remove migration lock timeout #34338

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #34144
  • use switch for SqlServerDateOnlyMemberTranslator #34417
  • remove repeated IsGenericMethod and GetGenericMethodDefinition in SqlServerByteArrayMethodTranslator #34419
